summary: Changes the Alik'r Prisoner's outfit from Alik'r clothes to default prison clothes (Roughspun Tunic and Footwraps).
descriptionHtml:
A small mod that changes the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Alik%27r_Prisoner]Alik'r Prisoner[/url]'s outfit to standard Skyrim prison clothes: a Roughspun Tunic and Footwraps.

It bothered me a little that the Alik'r Prisoner (from the quest "In My Time Of Need") got to wear his normal clothes in jail. So I changed his outfit to [i]PrisonerOutfit[/i]. I also made his hair more presentable, since it's no longer hidden.

This should be compatible with any mod that doesn't modify the Alik'r Prisoner. If you have one that does, put this mod lower than that one in your load order.

This mod has been cleaned with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]TES5Edit[/url].

If you find any bugs or incompatibilities, please let me know in the Posts tab!

This mod is also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=194568195]Steam Workshop[/url].
author: Aaron of Minneapolis
